roleset.name: upset, cause anxiety in
roleset.note: DISQUIET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disquiet' based on internet usage examples, membership in VN. Verbnet entry 31.1. Comparison with disgruntle. (from disquiet.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: instrument or manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: Passive
example.text: [The ranks of the company]-1 were disquieted *-1 by the policy changes.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: Charlie Chaplin's Modern Times (1936) disquieted citizens with that overwhelming question.
